favourite.article: Lord, all my days are just for You, all my being I open to You! Jesus, You love me. I love You, Lord. We're in love!

Oh! I love it... "I am young and Iâ€™m in love..."
The sweetest experience I have is when I fall in love... with the most beautiful, affectionate, intimate, and lovely One -- Christ!

Till this day, I still shed tears, emotions, bemoanings, truamas on my wasted years - in false religion, sin and mundane things of this world. The tearful joy will know no bounds until Jesus I see face to face when He comes to make His jewels. I will always remain grateful to THE LORD GOD ALMIGHTY for His Savings Grace in Jesus name. Amen.

This hymn is making me shed tears each time I listen to it. I wasted many many years in my youth. But listening to it gives me a true sense of God's forgiveness now that am in Christ Jesus my Saviour. I now believe that all my sins have been taken care of on the Cross of Calvary. I make effort, each day, to bring this message to young people I come across. Blessed be the name of the Lord God Almighty, in Jesus name. Amen.

We need to have a heart like Timothy, Phillip, and many more dear saints in the Bible desperately seeking the Lord and loving Him. So do not let others despise our youth. God loves young people to serve and love, even obey what He says to us. muakzzzz Jesus I love You so much, wanna kiss You literally... yeah.... praise the Lord.
Ecclesiastes 12:2 "Remember your Creator in the days of your youth." Young people, this is the best time to love, seek, and serve the Lord. We should love the Lord now, not later. Amen.
I'm a young man and I want to give my heart just for You Lord. I love You Lord now and forever.
What a revelation! What enjoyment! We are young and we are in love with the one from above! We'll be mingled with Him as one entity! We'll be His wife for the rest of eternity! Amen!
I'm young and in love; not with the world but with the LORD JESUS. I am daily experiencing such a sweet divine romance with the One I love.
Lord I am open to You. I give all my days and every part of me to You. Lord I love You!

Praise the Lord that we are young and we are in love!!! Not with anything else but the Lord Himself!! Brothers and sisters, young people, we must give ourselves to love the Lord!!no other way is prevailing, so sweet, so rich and so full of enjoyment!!!

article.author: Jonathan Karr
article.city: The Church as the Shining Lampstand in Denver

favourite.article: Oh how I love You Lord Jesus! I'm truly in love! Saints how sweet is the Lord's love! All we can do is love Him back! Every day we need to tell the Lord we Love Him as our dear bridegroom! OH LORD JESUS I LOVE YOU!
The world is nothing. But we ARE young and we ARE in love! With the Lord! The One who loved us and took our place at Calvary for He loved us. We don't want sin, we want Him!
